destinations.name: Nen Danang Restaurant
destinations.reason: First restaurant in Vietnam to receive a Michelin Green Star, offering innovative Vietnamese cuisine and a fine dining experience.

destinations.name: Ghenh Bang Reef (Son Tra Peninsula)
destinations.reason: A secluded spot with clear water and interesting rock formations, perfect for snorkeling and escaping the crowds. A hidden gem within the well-known Son Tra Peninsula.
